summary: Results-driven Customer Service Representative with 1-2 years of administrative experience, skilled in customer communication, Microsoft Excel, and data entry. Proven ability to build strong customer relationships, with a strong focus on attention to detail and organizational skills. Experienced in supply chain management, ERP systems, and full-time customer service roles, with excellent English language skills and ability to work in a team-oriented environment. Offers a unique blend of technical and interpersonal skills, with experience in sales, administrative tasks, and customer inquiry handling, and a strong desire for growth through hard work and dedication.

bullets: Architected and deployed internal automation tools using Python and Selenium to streamline data collection and reporting workflows, reducing manual administrative time by 40%.
Implemented secure API authentication protocols (JWT/Okta) to protect sensitive driver and route data.
Executed high-volume, last-mile delivery operations, maintaining a 4.9+ performance rating through route optimization and superior customer service.
Leveraged local geographic knowledge to navigate complex delivery windows and solve on-road logistical challenges in real-time.

education: Associate of Science in Computer Science (In Progress)
